code: import{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function EmailList(_ref){let{token}=_ref;const[emails,setEmails]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchEmails=async()=>{try{const res=await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/emails',{headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${token}`}});setEmails(res.data);}catch(error){console.error('Failed to load emails:',error);}};fetchEmails();},[token]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"email-list",children:emails.length>0?emails.map(email=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"email-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:email.subject}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:email.snippet})]},email.id)):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading emails..."})});}
